message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you, just like it does to me. This product, which I believe is worth $1200000 to you, is now being offered to you at a special price designed to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. I kindly request you to consider my offer of $1100000 for this exceptional item. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange for the details of the purchase. Thank you for considering this proposal.
